alert.note: Alert for Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Coalinga - Avenal; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota; West Side Mountains north of 198; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 25 at 1:16AM PST until January 25 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A DENSE FOG ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibilities in dense fog ranging from 800 feet to as low as 200 feet. * WHERE...Northwestern San Joaquin Valley * WHEN...Until 11 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Low visibilities will make driving conditions hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highway affected include, but are not limited to HIghway 152, Interstate 5 north of Lost Hills, Highway 198 west of Hanford, Highway 180 west of Fresno, and Highway 41 south of Fresno.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use low beam headlights, and keep plenty of distance between your vehicle and the vehicle in front of you.
